turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Onimusha: Warlords.
turn.1: What is the Onimusha: Warlords's Secret?
turn.2: As Samanosuke makes his way through the demon door, he encounters Guildenstern who summons an improved Marcellus.
turn.3: What happen after he encounters Guildenstern?
turn.4: After defeating him, Samanosuke makes his way into Fortinbras' throne room, where he finds Yuki and Yumemaru trapped on the upper level.
turn.5: What happen after he found out the truth?
turn.6: Before he can free them, Fortinbras enters the room and summons Nobunaga before the monster attacks Samanosuke.
turn.8: After Samanosuke defeats Fortinbras, he frees Yumemaru and Yuki as Kaede enters the room.
turn.9: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.10: However, as they flee the collapsing chamber, Samanosuke is grabbed by Fortinbras as Kaede, Yumemaru, and Yuki are forced to escape.
turn.12: Some of Samanosuke's blood falls on the gauntlet and activates it as it transforms him into an "Onimusha".
